attributes.action: stop the use of community support officers doing traffic dutys eg speed checks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cheshire Police see fit to use our community support officers to police the area of speeding drivers and they are also allowed to drive marked police vehicles which creates an illusion to the public that it is a police officer on the streets.they are not trained police drivers these people cant even save a child from a pond!!!!!
